content: marimo moss balls and red cherry shrimp make a great addition to any aquarium crochet your own with this amigurumi pattern and tutorial no aquarium needed tutorial available here bit ly/skspmbsvid to complete the pattern you will need 3mm crochet hook 8ply/dk weight yarn in red and dark green safety eyes 9mm pair and a 16mm pair scissors needle and stitch markers stuffing/polyfill wire approx 15cm long super glue/hot glue gun wire pet brush
